name: Awesome Logos
author: WP Mars

sections.description:
Awesome Logos WordPress Plugin

Ideal to showcase logos of sponsors, clients.

Show Image portfolios with grid having optional external links, external images by Image URL.

Grid can be of two types: Adjustable adaptable to available space or Responsive Grid.

Features:

  1. Lightbox for images.
  2. Simple Shortcode.
  3. Hover Effects
  4. Slider with swiping.
  5. Widget Ready
  6. Categories Logos/Images
  7. 38 customization options for Slider
  8. 17 customization options for Grid
  9. 15+ Arrows and Bullet skins for Slider
  10. Multiple Sliders/Grids on single page.
  11. Title with overlay or CSS Tooltip
  12. Option to Add, Delete, Reorder Slides.
    See live demo of plugin
sections.installation:
1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for Awesome Logos and click “Install now“
  2. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of ‘awesome-logos.zip’ to your plugins directory, which usually is ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  3. Activate the plugin
sections.faq:
Can I create multiple Awesome Logos slider/grids?

  • Yes. you can create unlimited Logo Slider/Grids.

Installation Instructions

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for Awesome Logos and click “Install now“
  2. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of ‘awesome-logos.zip’ to your plugins directory, which usually is ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  3. Activate the plugin

short_description: Awesome Logos to show slider carousel and grids of brands, partners logos or to showcase awesome images on your site.

upgrade_notice.1.0: Check your site after activation, it might conflict with any other plugin on your site.
